name: Empty World (Kroll_The_Kroll)
description:
The recording was found in one of the archives of an abandoned police station in Russia. The recording shows how the guy is looking for help, but something went wrong...

-------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------- ----------

Management and additional settings are in the "Settings" item.

In case of errors, write in the comments.

-------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------- ----------

If you like the game, I will start making a sequel.
